Html: Is there any plan to release Xrmservicetoolkit on CRM 2016?

dyainal wrote:
Is there any plan to release Xrmservicetoolkit on CRM 2016?
I need this version supported for CRM 2016 also.

MS Dynamics CRM 2016 is supported by XrmServiceToolkit 2.2/2.2.1 perfectly (but only with using old XRMServices/2011/Organization.svc service).

;)

Hi There.

I have not yet had some free time to look into CRM 2016 API, but there are plans to continue supporting the library for CRM 2016. As a matter of expanding the current library or branching it out to only support CRM 2016, I have not yet decided.

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
